goal.name: Fountain Pearl
goal.desc: The Fountain Pearl allows your dinoz to regenerate health every day at the Fountain of Youth.

goal.name: Pteroz Trophy
goal.desc: The Pteroz Trophy is awarded to players who have defeated the strange Pteroz. It also unlocks the Pteroz, making it available to buy in the Dinoz Shop.

goal.name: Hippoclamps Trophy
goal.desc: The Hippoclamps Trophy is awarded to players who have defeated the wild Hippoclamp. It also unlocks the Hippoclamps, making it available to buy in the Dinoz Shop.

goal.name: Rockies Trophy
goal.desc: The Rockies Trophy is awarded to players who have defeated the sleeping Rocky. It also unlocks the Rocky, making it available to buy in the Dinoz Shop.

goal.name: Quetzu Trophy
goal.desc: The Quetzu Trophy is given by Mandragore to players who have defeated the Archdorogon Grizorg. This unlocks the Quetzu, making it available to buy in the Dinoz shop.

goal.name: Dinoland Tour
goal.desc: This yellow shirt is awarded for your participation in the Dinoland Tour! You are now one of the great Dinoland explorers.

goal.name: Venerable Eye
goal.desc: The Venerable Eye is an extremely rare item. Only the finest warriors can possess it! People say that it has incredibly powerful magical abilities.

goal.name: Taurus the magnificent
goal.desc: You helped Baobob to dispatch Taurus, the infamous Moueffe, to the depths of the Dark World. You're not ready to meet him again yet, although word of your courage is already spreading throughout Dinoland.

goal.name: Official Dinoland Stamps
goal.desc: This unlimited supply of stamps from the Dinoland Postal Militia is proof of your entitlement to stay in Dinoland for as long as you'd like.

goal.name: Negative Lodestone Shard
goal.desc: This Negative Lodestone Shard was given to you by the ing of the Rockies himself! Who knows what mysterious powers it holds.

goal.name: Sidereal Feather
goal.desc: This feather, a gift from a distant traveller, allows you to edit your presentation on your player profile.

goal.name: Kabuki Aura
goal.desc: The Kabuki Aura gives you access to Totem Island where you may find Kabukis, survivors of the Huge Cataclysm!

goal.name: Demon Scroll
goal.desc: This ancient scroll gives you access to the Demon Shop in the Twilight Cemetary!

goal.name: Illustrated Mission Guidebook
goal.desc: The Illustrated Mission Guidebook lets you see the list of missions which have been completed by your Dinoz, and which remain to be completed.

goal.name: Diamantite Pebble
goal.desc: The Diamantite Pebble is a stone which is packed with a naturally occurring array of elements which, when combined under pressure, allow the owner to see all their dinoz at a glance. The diamantite, on the other hand, is only for show.

goal.name: Arborian Dictionary
goal.desc: A very old book, which you have managed to open, maybe now it can be used to decipher the Arborian language.

goal.name: Zen Medal
goal.desc: The zen medal is awarded to the top Dojo in Dinoland, there is no more powerful Dinoz master! You get all the glory, the fame and the respect of all other Dinoz masters...!!

goal.name: Belius the Illustrious
goal.desc: You have defeated the powerful Belius, the infernal Santaz. He has been sent back to the depths of the Dark World.

goal.name: Mandragore Doll
goal.desc: A doll in the likeness of Mandragore, which can be used as a voodoo doll, punching-bag or a pillow, as you choose. It is in pretty poor condition, the previous owner must have taken their frustrations out on it on a regular basis.

goal.name: 3-eyed Medallion
goal.desc: This medallion opens the portal to the celestial temple.

goal.name: Smogs Medallion
goal.desc: This medallion proves that you have finished the smog quest.

goal.name: Adventurer
goal.desc: What kind of adventurer are you?
goal.icon: What kind of adventurer are you?

goal.name: Deaths
goal.desc: How many times have you died in combat?
goal.icon: How many times have you died in combat?

goal.name: Education
goal.desc: Number of days spent on the site
goal.icon: Number of days spent on the site.

goal.name: Trainer
goal.desc: Number of Level-ups carried out
goal.icon: Number of Level-ups carried out.

goal.name: Monster Killer
goal.desc: Number of monsters killed on your adventures
goal.icon: Number of monsters killed on your adventures.

goal.name: Dinoz Challenger
goal.desc: Number of Dinoz defeated in events
goal.icon: Number of Dinoz defeated in events.

goal.name: Health Points Recovered
goal.desc: How many HP have you regained?
goal.icon: How many HP have you regained?

goal.name: Wood Specialist
goal.desc: Number of Wood level-ups
goal.icon: Number of Wood level-ups.

goal.name: Fire Specialist
goal.desc: Number of Fire level-ups
goal.icon: Number of Fire level-ups.

goal.name: Lightning Specialist
goal.desc: Number of Lightning level-ups
goal.icon: Number of Lightning level-ups.

goal.name: Air Specialist
goal.desc: Number of Air level-ups
goal.icon: Number of Air level-ups.

goal.name: Water Specialist
goal.desc: Number of Water level-ups
goal.icon: Number of Water level-ups.

goal.name: Shovel Smasher
goal.desc: Number of broken shovels
goal.icon: Number of broken shovels.

goal.name: Hunter
goal.desc: Number of times you've set out to kill stuff!
goal.icon: Nombre d'actions de chasses réalisées.

title.name: Reader of Hunting, Shooting, Fishing etc.

goal.name: Harvester
goal.desc: Number of harvesting operations carried out
goal.icon: Number of harvesting operations carried out.

goal.name: Fisherman
goal.desc: Number of fishing trips
goal.icon: Number of fishing trips.

goal.name: Energizer
goal.desc: Number of actions carried out which regenerate energy
goal.icon: Number of actions carried out which regenerate energy.

goal.name: Scavenger
goal.desc: Number of scavenges carried out
goal.icon: Number of scavenges carried out.

goal.name: Salesman
goal.desc: Number of sales made at the market
goal.icon: Number of sales made at the market.

goal.name: Buyer
goal.desc: Number of purchases made in the shop
goal.icon: Number of purchases made in the shop

goal.name: Community Life
goal.desc: Number of clans this player has appeared in
goal.icon: Number of clans this player has appeared in.

goal.name: Beautician
goal.desc: Number of Beauty Contest titles won by this player's dinoz
goal.icon: Number of Beauty Contest titles won by this player's dinoz.

goal.name: Attacker
goal.desc: Number of attacks carried out against enemy castles
goal.icon: Number of attacks carried out against enemy castles.

goal.name: Defender
goal.desc: Number of times you have defended your castle
goal.icon: Number of times you have defended your castle.

goal.name: Dinoland Community
goal.desc: The most giving of Dinoz masters

icon.name: The 'crème de la crème' of Dinoz masters

goal.icon: For those who are committed to making Dinoland an even better place!

goal.name: Gold Medal
goal.desc: You are the Dinolympic Games Gold Medallist! Congratulations!
goal.icon: You finished first! Congratulations!

goal.name: Silver medal
goal.desc: The Silver Medallist in the 1st Dinolympic Games!
goal.icon: You finished second! Bravo!

goal.name: Bronze Medal
goal.desc: The Bronze medal winner in the 1st Dinolympic Games!
goal.icon: You finished third! Great performance!

goal.name: Participation Medal
goal.desc: You were ranked amongst the top Dinolympic competitors!
goal.icon: Dinolympic Athlete - be proud of your achievements!

goal.name: 1st Limit Broken
goal.desc: Your dinoz have evolved!
goal.icon: Your dinoz have evolved and reached level 60!

goal.name: 2nd Limit Broken
goal.desc: Your dinoz have evolved!
goal.icon: Your dinoz have evolved and reached level 70!
